summary: Client Sarah initiated a vision meeting. The PM asked for the project name; Architect, Developer, and QA did not provide comments.

actions.task: Propose and confirm the project name with client Sarah

risks.risk: No project name was decided during the meeting, which could delay kickoff and planning.
risks.mitigation: PM to propose a name within 3 business days and confirm with Sarah; document the agreed name to unblock planning.
